document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of squat lobsters of the world (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura-families Chirostylidae, Galatheidae and Kiwaidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Munida sacksi
. — Macpherson, 1993a: 438 (part) (specimens from New Caledonia , 300–330 m ). — Macpherson, 1999a: 424 ( Vanuatu , 486–599 m ) (not
M. sacksi Macpherson, 1993
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

, fig. 6 ( New Caledonia , Vanuatu , Fiji and Tonga , 303–622 m ). —
Baba, 2005: 261
(key, synonymies).

subSubSection.paragraph:

.

Munida descensa Macpherson, 2006a: 306
, fig. 9 ( French Polynesia , Austral Archipelago, 250–450 m ).

250–302 m
.

subSubSection.paragraph:

Type data: holotype , ovigerous female, MNHN-Ga 4625.
